Package frogger_main

Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
frogger_main.PlayerController
public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
This class is responsible for i/o of controlling the player
Author:
karim

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PlayerController​(Player player)
    This method sets up the player model by defining all spirits required for movement

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void checkcontrol()
    This method runs with the game timer and its in charge for checking keyboard input and arranging appropriate actions once input is detected ands it changes Player spirits accordingly since it is a constantly running function it also calls the checkintersections function

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerController

      public PlayerController​(Player player)
      This method sets up the player model by defining all spirits required for movement
      Parameters:
      player - This is a passed reference of the player object

  • Method Details

    • checkcontrol

      public void checkcontrol()
      This method runs with the game timer and its in charge for checking keyboard input and arranging appropriate actions once input is detected ands it changes Player spirits accordingly since it is a constantly running function it also calls the checkintersections function
      See Also:
      checkIntersections()
